front.title: Considerations for IGMP and MLD Snooping Switches

abstract.t: This memo describes the recommendations for IGMP- and MLD-snooping switches. These are based on best current practices for IGMPv2, with further considerations for IGMPv3- and MLDv2-snooping. Additional areas of relevance, such as link layer topology changes and Ethernet-specific encapsulation issues, are also considered.
